Posts.Content: Hi Tracey' I know exactly how you feel. I had surgery september 2014.Wide local excision and axillary clearance. Chemo,&Radiotherapy Now on Tamoxifen (Hot flushers horrendous)  I also have terrible pain in my legs and knees.Went to my G.P. as suggested by my B.C.Nurse.who asked me if i had injured myself falling.I told him no.he did"int seem to no anything about after care. I was starting to think all kinds, Like has it gone into my bones, and nobody has picked up on it. Some days are worse than others.  I hope you get sorted soon please let me know if neurologist was any help. Best Wishes Doreen.x
Posts.Title: Left disabled after cancer treatment
